thread.title: George H.W. Bush Throws Coin Toss at Super Bowl 2017 (Video)
thread.title_full: George H.W. Bush Throws Coin Toss at Super Bowl 2017 (Video)

author: Just Jared
title: George H.W. Bush Throws Coin Toss at Super Bowl 2017 (Video)
text:
Former President George H.W. Bush and his wife Barbara Bush made a surprise appearance at the 2017 Super Bowl following both of their hospitalizations recently!
The 92-year-old former president was wheeled onto the field while Barbara , 91, rode in a cart. When they got to their destination, Barbara stood up and watched while George threw the coin for the toss.
Watch a clip from the coin toss below and watch the rest of the video now on NFL’s Facebook page.
WATCH: Former President George H.W. Bush assists with the coin toss at #SuperBowl LI alongside former First Lady Barbara Bush. #SB51 pic.twitter.com/q5v7jqmSOQ 
— Good Morning America (@GMA) February 5, 2017
